The art of dialling performed geometrically, by scale and compasses, arithmetically, by the canons of sines and tangents, instrumentally, by a trigonal instrument, accommodated with lines for that purpose by William Leybourn ... Art of dialling Leybourn, William, 1626-1716.
[13], 175, [10] p. : ill.
Printed by S.G. and B.G for Benjamin Tooke and Thomas Sawbridge ..., London : [1669]
Date of publication from Wing. Advertisement: p. [12]. Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: film lacks frontispiece.
